arts.ttl: Pre-Match Analysis: Aston Villa vs Bologna
arts.sum: Defensively, Bologna will look to remain compact and frustrate Villa, potentially drawing the game into a cagey affair. Villa are expected to take the initiative, controlling possession through a midfield likely anchored by John McGinn .
